selected_quotes: From scholarships to policy changes #Nigeria #Egypt #Angola are leading the way to create room for women scientists

Morocco, Egypt, Angola, Nigeria and Mauritius – are leading the way to create room for women scientists #empowerment
#STEM needs female researchers! Several African countries working on breaking the women in the kitchen norm.
How Africa can empower more women to become leaders in science @TC_Africa @GhadaBassioni @joanafonso…

citation.abstract: Getting more women into science, technology, engineering and maths fields is a process that involves many parts of a society. Several African countries are setting the pace.
citation.title: How Africa can empower more women to become leaders in science
